label: perPackageUnitQuantity
comment: A number of units per package in this logistics package.
A number of units per package in this referenced logistics package.
The number of units per package in this subordinate line trade delivery.
The number of units per package, at line level, in this trade delivery.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
Any self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.
Supply chain shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery.
